info.name: KABOOM
info.description:
This collection consists of all the endpoints for the Kaboom api. To get started, put in your auth token as the value in the token variable. If you are using your own instance of the api, change the base_url.

### Auth required:
[  ] - Comics

[  ] - Cartoons

[X] - Users

formdata.value: A show about bob and his burgers
